function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation in green housing may lead to the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor construction practices in prefabricated dwellings may lead to the accumulation of harmful microbes and contagions.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for revision of building codes and certification processes to address specific pandemic-related needs","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to inadequate building hygiene and wellbeing.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate indoor environment leading to poor air quality and health issues.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of appropriate home environments for at-home work during covid-19","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate management of infrastructural and technical facilities","category":"Infrastructure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient adaptation of facilities management in response to covid-19","category":"Infrastructure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of disease transmission in crowded living spaces due to pandemic restrictions.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to green spaces and outdoor environments in housing designs.","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through shared personal comfort systems pcs in the built environment.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scientific studies on indoor air quality","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dominance of million-dollar cities in areas with attractive natural surroundings","category":"Land Use","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increase in remote work leading to reduced physical interaction and potential decrease in and shared living spaces.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health and safety risks in indoor spaces due to covid-19","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personal space and outdoor spaces in current housing stock","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased remote working leading to prolonged indoor exposure","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shared areas in condo buildings seen as risky inconvenience due to
